p: The extracts and Lavandula angustifolia essential oil have various pharmacological effects described in the literature, such as anticonvulsant [ 5], anxiolytic [ 6], antioxidant, anticholinesterase [ 7, 8], antimicrobial [ 9], and antifungal activities [ 10]. Additionally, various constituents in the oil also have valuable pharmacological properties, such as anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and antimicrobial [ 11â€“ 14].
